safetyTips: NO CONTACT ON ALL DELIVERIES. We have enhanced our already very rigorous hygiene regulations and continue to revise them with updates to government guidelines.
name: The Butchery Ltd
description: Native-breed, English meats from small farmers, butchered with respect. Now offering online orders for next-day home delivery. Chilled Home delivery is free for orders over £50 otherwsise £3.50 and carried out by ourselves or chilled cycle couriers.  You can also order a small of selection of basics like butter, eggs, sourdough and condiments. Delivery is currently available to SE22, SE21, SE23, SE26 amongst others, full up-to-date list on our shop site.
